values:
::WHAT WOULD YOU DO IF::
I cried: I'd give you a hug, and hang out with u so I could make you feel better! 
I asked you to help: I'd help in any way I could.
I was becoming suicidal: I'd do anything that I could to help you thorough it.
I killed myself: I don't even want to think about that..I'd be absolutely devestated..
I died from natural causes: Effffff that! You're only 16. :o)
I said I liked you: I'd be flattered..n then we'd see from there.
I kissed you: I'd kiss u back..that's happened before. :o)
I started smoking: You already smoke, haha, and you know what I think of that..
I stole something: Be proud of u..cuz I don't have the guts to do it.
I was hospitalized: I'd come visit you and bring you balloons...whether you like them or NOT.
I ran away from home: I'd find you.
I got in a fight and you were there: Been there, done that, I think. I'd just make sure you didn't get hurt..and if you did, I'd shriek..lol


:WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT MY:
Personality: It's very Eric-like..haha
Eyes: Brown.
Face: White.
Hair: Long & you better not cut it..I may not recognize you.
Clothes: Everything is cool, except when you wear those red boots with shorts..that bothers me a bit..lol..but HEY, what do I know?
Voice: Deep. I like it!
Humor: Funny! You are funny, & you have a good sense of humor.
Choice of music: It dependssssss.
Manerisms: What manerisms? haha j/k
Family: They seem nice! :o)


:WOULD YOU:
Be my friend: I already am, silly!
Tell me the truth no matter what: Of course.
Lie to make me feel better: No.
Spread rumors about me: 'Course not!
Keep a secret if I told you one: I always have.
Loan me some cash: If you paid me back. ;o)
Hold my hand: Have.
Take a bullet for me: Yes..I would.
Keep in touch: Yup. I always have.
Try and solve my problems: Help you, yes..I don't think that anyone can solve anyone else's problems unless the person wants to solve them themselves..does that make sense?
Love me: I love you like a friend already! Yay!

All of this rain really sucked..a lot of houses got destroyed. :o/ Sad. Well, everywhere I want to go, there's a damn bridge that's broken..so I have to find a round-about way to get to Atsion Road before Sara gets back from Myrtle Beach because I have big an AWESOME plan..and also because I can't wait an entire freaking month for the bridge to be fixed..by then the summer'll be almost over. That is awful to think about. I don't WANNA go back to school. Yuck! Anyway.. I've been grounded for a few days because my sister & brother in law got me in a little bit of trouble, accidently. :-X ..Not that there's been much to do anyway since I can't go anywhere.. My mom's still upset with me. Oh well, she'll get over it. They're home until next Friday, and I have to work like EVERY day. I have to work Saturday, Monday, and then Wednesday-Friday. What make me mad is that I wasn't suppose to work Monday, but apparently now I have to. Blah. So Tuesday I think I'm going down the shore with them. Whooot! Saturday night there's a carnival..gotta find someone to bring with me.. As for today, I'm going to the outlets, & then babysitting tonight..what fun..

I'm pretty bored, and it's pretty much impossible to do anything around here since it's all flooded, so I'm gonna do this survey. [ All the Boring Stuff ] Name: Cory Do you like it?: Not really, but I guess it could be worse. Age: 16 Birthday: 3.13.88 Sign: Libra Location: My computer room. Crush: Pah. :o/ Natural hair color: Brown. Yuckie! Current hair color: Blonde Eye color: Brown Height: 5'8" Birthplace: A hospital, silly! Shoe size: 8.5 [ family ] Parents: Bunny & George Siblings: Dawn, Michael, Frankie, and Chrissy..then there's Dan & Phil..but they don't exactly count.. Live with: My mom & dad. favorite relative: My mom! [ favorites ] Number: 13. Color: Pink, light yellow, and baby blue. Time: Uhh..night time? Month: Any months I'm not in school. Song: At the moment? Slow Motion...but give it a week, and it'll change..haha Movie: Cruel Intentions Flavor: Watermelon Band: Too many Season: Summer Sport: Are yucky! Class: None. Drink: Cherry coke Veggie: Carrots or cucumbers TV Show: Full House & The Cosby Show..lol how old school.. Radio Station: 92.5, 97.5, 104.5 94.5, etc. Store: Old Navy Phrase: "Aww man", "For Real?", "That sucks", etc. Animal: Monkeys & frogs..I love catching froggies at Sara's! Yay! State: My favorite state? Uhh, New York. Lots to do. [ this or that ] Me/You: Mmm, what? Coke/pepsi: Pepsi Day/night: Night Aol/aim: AIM Cd/cassette: CD Dvd/vhs: DVD Jeans/khakis: Jeans Car/truck: Car Tall/short: Tall, I guess..lol Lunch/dinner: Dinner Silver/Gold: Silver Alcohol/Weed: Alcohol [ love and relationships ] Do you have a bf/gf?: No Do you have a crush?: Yea, 2. How long have you liked him/her?: A few months..for both of them Do you like this person?:I have my reasons for both. How long was your longest relationship?: A year and a month. How long was your shortest relationship?:2 days.. [ the past ] What is the one thing you would change about your past?: I'm not sure.. What is the biggest mistake you've made in your life?: Ahh. Last thing you heard: I'm listening to Meant to Live by Switchfoot, if that counts. Last thing you saw: Uh, this computer screen.. Last thing you said: I dunno, probably why? Who is the last person you saw?: My mommy Who is the last person you hugged?: My mom, I think..haha Who is the last person you fought with?: I don't like fighting, but it was probably with my dad. I dislike him a whole lot..lol Who is the last person you were on the phone with?: Katie W. What is the last TV show you saw?: The news, but last night I was watching Full House and the Andy Griffith Show until 2am..haha fun stuff.. What is the last song you heard?: Well, now I'm listening to Here Without You by 3 Doors Down.. What are you wearing?: Tee shirt and sweat pants..aka my pajamas What are you doing?: Filling this out..duhh! Who are you talking to?: Eric, online What song are you listening to: Suprisingly, from a few questions ago, the song has changed. Now I'm listening to Whiskey Lullaby..this song makes me sad..so I think I shall change it. Where are you?: Computer room Who are you with?: Myself Are you online?: Obviously. How are you feeling?: Okay. Kinda bored..and my neck hurts cuz I slept wrong. Eep. Are you in a chatroom?: Nope [ future ] What day is it tomorrow?: Wednesday What are you going to do after this?:Well, I think I'm gonna go take a shower and then attempt to cross the flooded park to get to Katie's house..lol Who are you going to talk to?: Uh, Katie? Where are you going to go?: *Rolls eyes* Didn't I go over this already? How old will you be when you graduate?: 18 What do you wanna be?: Either a nurse or something to do with medicine. Lately I've been leading towards pharmasist..who knows? Where will you be in 25 years?: I don't know, but I'll tell you I won't be living anywhere outside the U.S. [ have you ever ] Drank?: Yup Had sex?: Yeah.. Stolen?: No Done anything illegal?: Yes Wanted to die?: Yes Hit someone?: Not intesely, but yeah. [ other ] Do you write in cursive or print?: Print. I hate cursive. Are you a lefty or a righty?: Righty What is your sexual preference?: BOYS. :o) What piercings do you have?: Four ear piercings. Do you drive?: Not yet. Do you have glasses or braces?: Glasses, but I don't wear them..haha [ last ] Last car ride: Yesterday Last kiss: A week ago.. Last good cry: Eh. last library book checked out: A few months ago last movie seen: In the theater? Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban last book read: Mm..not sure. last cuss word uttered: I don't remember. last beverage drank: Crystal Light Rasberry Ice Tea..yum last food consumed: Yogart last phone call: Katie last time showered: Last night 1 MINUTE AGO: Filling this out 1 HOUR AGO: Talkin on the phone? 1 DAY AGO: At the gym 1 WEEK AGO: Hmm. 1 MONTH ago: Ins chool..yucky! 1 YEAR AGO: Yuck. I LOVE: my friends.. I HATE: my enemies..haha I FEAR: lots of things. HOPE: that what was said between me and another person last night wasn't a bunch of shit. I FEEL: bored. I MISS: being needed I HIDE: from my dad..lol I MISS: a lot of things..but I miss Sara cuz she's too far away and I don't like it..lol I WANT: to be needed I NEED: to take a shower I THINK: that this survey was a waste of time.
This rain really sucks..I don't think it'll ever stop..hah. Rain puts me into such a "blah" mood, but a recent event has changed it to a happy mood. :o) Whoo!

Emotion is a very strong word..with an even stronger meaning. Emotions can change everything. It's funny how little things can make you emotional..like songs..like this song. ..That's my thought of inspiration at the moment.. Hope u enjoyed it..

It's been a long time, huh? I've been working a lot. All this week. I had off today, but I have to work tomorrow 9am-6pm..which kind of sucks because I'm babysitting until around 2am. I got my first paycheck yesterday. I worked 30 hours and got $165. Seems like it's not that much, haha. But it's something, so that's good. 

Summer's going by too quickly, and I don't like it! It's almost the middle of July. Yuck. 

..On a side note, this computer won't load AIM Express..how annoying. 

I can't wait til tomorrow is over. THREE DAYS IN A ROW OFF..whoo! I work Thursday and my sister & brother in law come home for a couple days, but I have to work Thursday & Saturday..possibly Sunday. Haha. Not cool.

Not sure if my brother is coming home now. :o( He says he doesn't wanna deal with my dad. That makes two of us. 

Anyway, I don't really have much I feel like writing about in here. Just figured I'd update since I have nothing better to do right now..

..til next time..

Life was so much e.a.s.i.e.r when: -Our worries were that recess was too short -Desicions were solved by 'eni-meani-miney'mo -Only skinned knees brought tears, -Boys were yucky and had cooties, -And good-byes only meant until tomorrow *~*~*
It seems like the only time I write in here lately is when I'm upset. I haven't written for a while, which means I've been happy..but right now I can't even describe what I'm feeling. :o/ Lonely, upset, frustrated, confused, jelous, and alone are a few words..I was fine up until an hour ago. I was having a good day. Now I can't stop crying. I wanna talk to Sara. I hate complaining to people..I feel like a lot of people are angry at me for something. I just..wanna go to sleep and forget. And then there's things that I'm confused as hell about. I hate this feeling. I'd even talk to my mom about things at this point, but I dunno. My dad is on my case now..ugh. What happened to the days when everything went right? For days on end? I want happiness back in my life..but it doesn't look like I'm gonna get it. Whatever.

Wow, so I start work on Monday..that sucks. So far summer has been fun. Mostly. I had to wake up yesterday at 6:00am to go get bloodwork concerning my bruises. After I got blood taken, I was sick to my stomach for a long while. It really sucked. :-X I never got sick before when I got that done. Weirddd. Then I went to get my uniforms for work. How exciting. I look like a geek..I have to wear my damn shirt tucked into my pants..I HATE IT. Ah! Anyway. Then I went to Sara's. Here comes the funny part. We had been planning on hanging out with Andrew yesterday..and I told Andrew I'd call him when I got to Sara's and we'd get Zach to bring us over. Well, I whip out my piece of paper with a list of phone numbers on it of people I haven't remembered yet. Andrew and Ricky happen to be next to one another on this list..hah. Well, I called Ricky established that we were gonna come to his house (Sara & I) and he was like alright..haha. (*I DIDN'T KNOW IT WAS RICKY, I THOUGHT IT WAS ANDREW*)..so we go to Andrew's house..and he's not home. I WAS PISSED AS HELL..hah I thought he was standing us up. So I was kinda sad, but really aggrivated because it was hot as hell n I was just annoyed..lol so then we went back to Sara's and got bathing suits and we went to Zach's to go swimming. Then, like four hours later, we go back to Sara's and her mom said Ricky called for her. I was like, what..lol so I called Ricky (*Sara & Ricky aren't friends, so I figured he called for me..but I didn't know why*)..he was saying how I called him this morning and we talked. And I was like no we didn't talk this morning..lol and I was thinking he was either drunk or trying to confuse me. Then after like 5 minutes, he was like, "You called and said you were gonna come over with Sara". I DIED. I couldn't stop laughing. It all came together! Then I realized that I had left a msg on Andrew's answering machine saying how we were there and he wasn't blah blah blah..haha it was really funny. I haven't explained all of this to Andrew yet, but I will eventually. Hmm..so I slept over Sara's last night..it was fun. I was realllly tired tho. I've been doing a lot of thinking lately. (*Yes, me thinking*) However..I can't write about what I am thinking about in here..because it's a big secret..shh! Haha, not really, some ppl know. Well..I dunno wut I'm doing today..maybe hanging out with Ashley later? I dunno..but wut I do know is that I'm gonna to sleep for a little while. Bye Byes.
Things really suck right now. I mean REALLY suck. I wish I didn't have to come home from Kali's. I feel like a fucking screw up..what am I doing?

I wanna write a real entry, but I dunno..I guess I'm only half in the mood..too much to write..so, fill it out! 

Dear Cory,

You are _______. We need to ________. I like when you ________. You need to do something about _________. My favorite thing about you is ________. The best thing we've done together was ________. I want you to ________. You make me _______. I hope that ________.


Love,

Well.. My theory that God gives you good things, and then throws in something bad to "test you" has proven to be true AGAIN. My mom woke me up frantically this morning around 10:30. My Aunt Theresa had just called and informed my mom that my Uncle Eddie had gone into diabetic shock, which was followed by kidney failure. My Aunt went to wake him up around 6:00am to give him his pills, and he wouldn't wake up. My uncle is a light sleeper due to sleep apnia. So my Aunt called the ambulance..his sugar level was in the 30's..which is really bad. So my mom woke me up, and told me to get up and get ready because we had to go to the hospital..I started freaking out when she said diabetic shock because my Grandmom had been in that A LOT, and it was not good..and then she said kidney failure. My Uncle Eddie is one of my favorite Uncles. He's very sick, but he manages to stay strong and lead a some-what normal life. He has heart disease, a pacemaker, cystic fibrosis, etc. He almost died when I was in 7th grade. He was my "sponser" when I made confirmation..I don't want to fucking lose him. He looked okay in the hospital..he was a little shaken up, which all of us were..we were there from around 11:45-4..he had to get a bunch of tests..I hope he's gonna be ok.. :o/ Life is REALLY torturous..my Uncle Wayne just almost died because of those damn aniorisms..then he gets better, and things get better..and now my Uncle Eddie is sick and in the hospital. :o( This is awful. His daugther's baby shower is tomorrow. Oh yes, here is some good news. My cousin Maria (another one of my uncle's daugthers..he has three) is pregnant again. This will be her third kid..tomorrow is Roxanne's baby shower..and Terry is pregnant too..but THAT is a whole nother story. Please God, let him get better... :o/

"Seth" has a girlfriend. And here I thought things were looking good. I'm more disappointed than I thought..but Sara said he didn't really sound enthusiastic about her..blah. He's really cute, and I really like his hair. But we have his phone number..so maybe we'll hang out. :o) In other news, I'm getting my hair highlighted today. YAY! I just wish I could get some red in it too. No such luck. That's wut I get for having old fashioned parents. Welllll, when I accused Andrew of saying that stuff, instead of Jay, Andrew got really pissed. He was like, "IT wasn't me! Why would I say that? Why don't you trust me?" Blah blah blah, and then I got the, "Fine, believe what you want." But I believe him. Then he was kinda 'eh' to me, so I asked him if he was mad, and he was like, "Not at all". He's really nice..he got offended that I didn't take his word over Jay's. Sara & I are hanging out with Andrew at some point next week. Exhilarating. That is all.

I think that from now on my entries are gonna be friends only..but if you read my livejournal, and you aren't on my friends list, or you don't have an LJ..leave me a comment and lemme know. ;o) My last few words..Elton John is amazing. Exams suck MAJORLY. I hate school. ..That is all..

Hm..well, let's see. Yesterday was completely uneventful! I slept over Sara's house Friday night..then my mom picked me up at 10 so I could go to the gym before it closed..(*it closes intensely early on Saturdays..which is DUMB*) I cleaned/vacumed/dusted my room so Sara could sleep over today..lol so I HOPE SHE'S HAPPY! Haha. That took a really long time..partly because my room was a disaster area, and partly because I was procrastinating. Then we went to Riviera that night..I was gonna see if I could hang out with Kat (a friend who lives around the corner from me), but then I wound up going to Babies R Us and Kohls with my mom. I LOVE BABIES R US..it makes me want a baby..lol So yeah, that was yesterday. Friday was really fun..except the Andrew episode, but I talked to him yesterday and he said he doesn't even remember Friday because he was drunk off his ass..somehow I think that's a lie, but suree..we were supoose to hang out Monday, but screw that..I think I might only talk to him again if he IMs or talks to me in school. Anyway, after the Andrew crap, Sara streaked my hair pink. It was amazing while it lasted..lol We went to Sara's dress rehersal for her dance..she is really good, from the right of the stage you can't even see my Sara because there's this really big girl in front of her. Arg! It was aggrivating..lol Oooo, then that night we made cookie dough..we needed chocolate chips, but her mom didn't have any..so we sat there and picked the chocolate chips out of chocolate chip muffin mix..it was really intense..lol pretty funny..yet lame..lol It took forever to make, and then we wound up not eating much of it because it didn't taste right.. *Flash to Saturday* - Humungous stomach ache on my part. Haha. That's what I get for eating raw eggs. Well, I must be going..to figure out what's going on for todayyy..my mom just got home. Bye byes!

FUCK THIS. At Sara's..we were gonna hang out with Andrew since he was all excited and met me in my lunch today to make sure we were still hanging out on Monday..so I suggested that we hang out today too, and he said that would be cool..well, he kinda just blew us off.. :o( I'm tired of ASSHOLES I saw this really cute guy today on Sara's bus..he's in my history class..very cute. Very long hair. I like it..Sara is gonna try to get his number. PAHHHHH. I really like Andrew. :o( Blah. Another jackass down. Might be sleeping over Sara's tonight..maybe...

Ugh. I dunno wut has been wrong with me lately, but I'm just feeling really down. I didn't even feel like getting out of bed this morning..I never do anymore. It seems like everyday has something shitty in it..something that goes wrong. We got our S-Tests back yesterday..state tests..yeah, I failed them miserably. I don't know what the fuck is wrong with me, but I just don't care anymore. Even though I know I should. I don't care about school, I don't care about my grades, I just don't care. If I fail this test, then what the hell am I gonna do when I take SAT's next year? I'm screwed. And I say I want to be a nurse. I'll never be smart enough for that..I'm too stupid to even realize wut is good for me..well, I guess I do know that..I'm just too dumb to get out of this damn funk I'm in. I'm only happy when I'm with my friends...other than that...I'd like to throw it all away. :o(

Ahh! I can't tell  you how many times my shirt came unbottoned today..and I was exposed..it was bad..lol

I'm going home with Sara tomomrrow and then going to her dress rehersal..maybe hanging out with Andrew..I hope. Then I'm going to her house on Sunday and sleeping over 'til Monday and hanging out with Andrew. WHATTA CRUSH. He is really hot..everytime I see him.....

So Greg knows I like him now..hm..

I still like Jay... :o( I miss talking to him..pah. 

Sara slapped Steve across the face. That made my day.

Well, I'm gonna go. bye.

Things really suck right now. I started crying in one of my classes today, and my teacher took me down to my school psychiatrist. I talk to him every Thursday during third period..well, we talked for a little while, and then he decided to tell me that he thinks I need to see a psychiatrist and get put on medication because my mood swings are very sparatic, and he thinks I have depression. WHY DO THEY USE MEDICINE TO SOLVE EVERYTHING? God damn it. No one ever fucking listens. It really pisses me off. So now I have to have a meeting between him, my mom, and I next week. This is fucking ridiculous ..Things are really shitty right now.. :o(

I JUST WANNA FORGET EVERYTHING. I FUCKING HATE LIVING HERE. I FUCKING HATE IT. I HATE LIVING WITH HIM! I'M SICK OF CRYING. SICK OF BEING YELLED OUT, PUT DOWN FOR NO GOD DAMNED REASON.

I'M SO SICK OF EVERYTHING. I HATE IT. GOD DAMN IT. I JUST WANNA GET AWAY.

:o(

Hi. Last night was cool. :o) I was planning on getting off early and going to sleep, but I wound up talking to Andrew until like 10:30 or so. I'm talking to him now again. I like him..even though a lot of people say he's a jerk-off..he's been really nice to me..always eager to hang out. It makes me feel special. That probably sounds dumb..oh well. I gotta go to the doctor today at five to get blood taken because my legs and arms are all ridiculously bruised..not sure why. Maybe it's some vitamin or something that I'm lacking in my diet..I don't wanna get blood taken..I'm scared..lol Spending a lot of time with Sara this weekend. Whooooo, which means we'll also chill with Andrew. I wonder what'll go down with that..hehe. Sara said that whatever goes down, she wants to be there. She's amazing..most of my friends would be like, Do it on ur own time....but then there's Sara who wants to videotape it..lol I just made myself laugh..how sad. I wanna call my Uncle Wayne toinght to see how he is..I am hoping that he's actually going to go through with building a bond with me this summer..because..he really reminds me of my Grandpop..and I miss him.. :o/ Anyway, I must be going..review packets..blah!

Alright. I had to do it. I made a list of my goals this summer..I am officially a list loser. Haha. -Lose 35 pounds. -Build a relationship with my Uncle Wayne. -Have FUN hanging out with my friends. -Attempt to get my mom to quit smoking. (Mission Impossible) -Play around..no serious boyfriend..which leads me to.. -KISS ANDREW -Spend as least time at home as possible. -Get & maintain a job -Save $ for my carrrrrr -Spend lots of time with Sara, Kali, Cara, Ash and Nikki -Get over my shyness when it comes to introducing myself to guys who are banging..hah (*Sara, that Wawa episode deal kinda prepared me for this one..:-p*) -GO TO CARNIVALS...(*i'm a geek..*) ..That's about it for now..I believe. Goooooood-bye..I must be off to the gym now..for real. Hah. I'm in a much better mood than earlier..whee. ..I did see Jay for the first time in a week today..it kinda sucked because he looked really hot and..yeah..pahhh. All hot guys are assholes..it seems..hah.

I'm in a slightly better mood.
I was just really disappointed yesterday because I really wanted to hang out with Andrew, and then my mom had to pick me up two hours early because she was "hot and tired". Pah.
Well, we'll be hanging out this weekend, so I'm happy. :o) 
He's really hot..for a freshmen.. :-p

Ah, I have my permit test next week. Ohhhh man..Cory driving. Scarey stuff.

Gotta get ready to go to the gym. Whee.
I'm in history right now. Can't concentrate on work. Just so..blah. I need something to make me happy. I'm just not. :o(

I just got home from Sara's. We had a lot of fun..I'll write about that tomorrow tho. I dunno why, but I'm all of the sudden feeling really depressed. I'm almost crying, and I just..I dunno. I'm in one of my I wanna go to sleep to get away moods. I know what I wanna get away from..but I just wanna stop thinking. I still have a lot of homework to do that I've been putting off, but I don't think I'll do it. Not in the mood. I guess I really should care about it, but I don't..I just wanna do what I wanna do..and that's it. School sucks. Two more weeks. I really needa bring up my grades. :o( I don't want my mom to be disappointed in me. Ah. I wish I was still at Sara's. I always have a lot of fun with her. We biked far and got hit on by a 23 year old. He was nice looking..beautiful eyes..too bad they were contacts. I feel very unattractive. I need to lose more weight. :o/ I'm feeling really lonely..ugh. In other news, I'm getting a bike so I can go places. :o) I might just use my dad's until I get one. Now, where am I to go? Hah. :o/ I want to smile..but I feel like crying. :o( I'm gonna stop bitching now.

I don't even know.
I can't explain what I'm feeling right now.
CONFUSED is a word. Fucking retarded is another.

I went to visit my Uncle Wayne in the hospital today.
I want a close relationship with him now..but it might be too late. 
I'm such a fucking idiot. WHY THE FUCK did I ignore him this LONG?! He's been trying to make peace with the rest of his fucking family that he has left..and wtf do I do? I don't even give him a second chance.
I thought I had a good reason, but now I just wanna kick myself for this.

I told him I was sorry..I told him that I wanted to have a relationsihp with him..and he told me that if it isn't too late, he wants one too. He told me he loves me. I started to cry. How can he love me after what I have been doing? I was just scared to get close to him after he hurt my Grandpop so bad..

What is the right thing to do?

I had fun yesterday & today. I love hanging out with my friends. Zach is picking me up tomorrow and we're gonna hang at Sara's..and possibly get together with Andrew. Cool?
 
Pah. Can't really write much else..

So here we are tonight, you and me together The storm outside, the fire is bright And in your eyes I see what's on my mind You've got me wild turned around inside And then desire, see, is creeping up heavy inside here And know you feel the same way I do now Now let's make this an evening Lovers for a night, lovers for tonight Stay here with me, love, tonight just for an evening When we make our passion pictures You and me twist up secret creatures And we'll stay here Tomorrow go back to being friends Go back to being friends But tonight let's be lovers, We kiss and sweat We'll turn this better thing to the best Of all we can offer, Just a rogue kiss Tangled tongues and lips, See me this way I'm turning and turning for you Girl, just tonight Float away here with me An evening just wait and see But tomorrow go back to your man I'm back to my world And we're back to being friends Wait and see me, Tonight let's do this thing All we are is wasting hours until the sun comes up it's all ours On our way here Tomorrow go back to being friends Go back to being friends Tonight let's be lovers, say you will And hear me call, soft-spoken whispering love A thing or two I have to say here Tonight let's go all the way then Love I'll see you, Just for this evening Let's strip down, trip out at this One evening starts with a kiss Run away And tomorrow back to being friends Lovers...love...lovers Just for tonight, one night...love you And tomorrow say goodbye I love this song..it reminds me of how I'm feeling right now..very confused, yet happy. :o)

Fill it out, beeeeeyatch!...*Cute face* Please?

1. What is your name? 
2. Are we friends?
3. When and how did we meet?
4. What was your first impression of me?
5. Do you still think that way?
6. What's the fondest memory you have of me?
7. How long do you think we will be friends?
8. Do you love me?
9. Do we have fun when we are together?
10. Would you kiss me?
11. Would you hug me?
12. Physically, what stands out?
13. Emotionally, what stands out?
14. Do you wish I was cooler?
15. On a scale of 1-10, how hott fuckin amazing am I? 
16. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it.
17. Am I loveable?
18. How long have you known me?
19. Describe me in four words.
20. Do you like the color of my hair?
22. What do you think my weakness is?
23. Do you think I'll get married?
24. What makes me happy?
25. What makes me sad?

I came home on the bus with Sara. Steve gave me shit. Retarded. I think most of it is just drama. Whatever. Then we got here, and debated on whether to go to the Renegade Rally, Mr. East, or Eric's. In front of Binkley's, I saw Jay, another guy, and two girls. He was holding hands with one girl, and they were pretty close..I was ready to cry. No matter what, I still like him, and it's ridiculous. I think he's amazing..I would do anything to be with him. :o( Then we rode the rest of the way home, and Andrew sped past us. He's a really nice kid. We chatted a bit, but he had to race home before his mom came home b/c he's grounded. We might hang out with him tomorrow night because I may sleep over Sara's tonight and tomorrow night because Sara & her mommy love me! Wahoo! I'm loveddddddddddd! Alrighty. Yesterday was..bad and good. Here's a summary of it..they were talking about video taping two people having sex, and Steve said something about not being able to video tape us having sex because I was self consious, and I should be because if they (Karl or Steve) had my body they'd be self consious too. (*I'm not sure which one of them said that..I was too mad to listen*)..and then Steve said how before he met me I was bulimic, then when we started going out I got fat, and now I'm an anorexic drug addict. Yeah, you better believe it! When I got home I was really upset, so I called Eric because we were suppose to hang out after school anyway. I asked him to come over. He did. I appreciated that a lot. Before I met him at the library, I stopped in at my Aunt Mary's house..she wanted to show me what she's doing to my Grandmom's old room..I hadn't been in that room since my Grandmom died. It really disturbed me..it still kinda smells like her..but she isn't there..obviously. I miss her..Anyway Eric & I hung out in the park..got a little lost..(well, I did..I didn't have any idea where I was)..Then I had to go so it wasn't sketchy that I wasn't really at the library (where my parents thought I was)..we went to the library, and who do we see coming? Chris..hah. Kinda bad timing, but that's alright. So I called my mom on Eric's cell phone, to see "if the workers left" (We had people in our house putting doors in, and I "went to the library" to get away from the noise"..and then my mom told me Walt was on the phone, and I got REALLY scared because of stuff that's been going on with my sister. So I attempted to run home, but it didn't really work since I was in really high flip flops. I was REALLY scared. Everything turned out to be okay..he just wanted to call and say hey, he missed me, etc..and we wound up having an hour long, very intense conversation. I always could talk to him more than I could talk to my sister because he can relate a lot more than my sister can. I love my sister though..anyway, so around 8:00, I hear my phone ring, but I couldn't get it because I was still on the phone with Walt..so after I got off of the phone with him, I checked my messages, called him back..but apparently he wasn't home yet..so I figured he was on his way back to his house..then 10 minutes later, he calls, I didn't hear the phone, but I heard the answering machine beep from the living room..but by the time I got to the machine it was too late..so I listened to the msg, and apparently he was still at the library with Chris..so I made up some bull shit excuse to go to my aunt's, and met up with him and Chris for a couple minutes. Not long, but long enough. I felt bad because I blew Chris off a little at first, lol, but I didn't mean to. Yeahhh..so I may be hanging out with Chris & Eric today, but I dunno. Maybe Kat could come over and keep Chris company..she lives like less than 200 feet from me, and we never hang out..lol that's kinda sad. I am hopefully having Nikki over on Saturday..and then we might hang out with Eric as well. Whoot. Well, I really needa be going because I still have to do my hair & make up. Eeep! Bye! *~Cory~*
